Te aplikacije će se automatski sakriti iz \"Nedavnih aplikacija\" kada budu bile otvorene sledeći put
Koristi OmniSwitch umesto podrazumevanog izgleda \"Nedavnih aplikacija\"
Budi siguran da si takođe uključio OmniSwitch koja se podešava otvaranjem OmniSwitch opcije.

, dok će odabir ikone otvoriti opcije prilagođavanja

Kako bi dodao %1$s, izaberi opciju Dodaj ikonu. Kada je %1$s dodan, biranje reda će promeniti krajnju poziciju %2$s

Kako bi izbrisao %1$s, povuci red horizontalno na levo ili desno. Ponovo postavi %1$s u listi tako sto ćeš vertikalno povući sidro sa leve strane.

Kako bi očistio ili vratio na podrazumevana podesavanja, pritisni Reset ikonu.

Kada si u režimu uređivanja, izvrši srednji pritisak i povuci dugme kako bi promenio njegovu poziciju ili izvrši dug pritisak na dugme kako bi prikazao meni uređivanja. Pozicija dugmeta će možda biti promenjena dok je meni prikazan.\n\nPostavljanje radnje dvostrukog dodira će izazvati malo kašnjenje jednog dodira.

Tikač je vidljiv samo kada heads-up obaveštenja nisu prikazana. Uređaji sa centralnim notch-em bi trebalo da sakriju izrez u podešavanjima Koriničkog interfejsa ili u Opcijama za programere.

Kako bi odstranio sve aplikacije, izvrši prstohvat sa dva prsta na panelu. Kako bi blokirao aplikaciju od odstranjivanja, izvrši dug pritisak na njenu ikonu da bi je stavio u listu zvezdica.\n\nZa dodatne opcije \"Nedavnih aplikacija\" kao što su više prozora ili ubijanje aplikacija, izvrši dug pritisak ili pomeri karticu aplikacije u panel.

To dismiss your notifications, swipe left or right on the fingerprint sensor on the back of your phone.

Swipe from bottom of the screen to trigger home action, keep it pressed to open recents screen. Swipe from left or right to go back.

Back gesture must start below this percentage of the screen

Don\'t send touch events for navigation and status bar gestures to apps
Smart pixels is a power saving feature. Depending on how many pixels you decide to turn off, you could see improvement in battery life.
Save battery by shutting off extra pixels
Shut off pixels to reduce power consumption
Enable Smart Pixels when battery saver is enabled
Prevents burn-in on OLED devices by shifting pixels every so often
Use gestures on bottom of the screen to control navigation

Back
- Swipe up on left or right side

Home
- Swipe up center

Recent apps
- Swipe up center and hold

Long press home
- Short swipe up and hold in the center

Works best with navigation bar disabled
Restart your device to apply changes
Select accent color, clock interface and more
Active volume stream will be displayed on the screen even if disabled here. Volume streams enabled here would be displayed forcefully.
This will reset battery history stats. Would you like to continue?
Display clock in quick status bar header

This mode disables the back button and you can trigger a back button action by a left swipe on navbar. Right swipe still triggers the last-app and the overview apps scrolling. To go home you can tap on any navbar empty space, not only the home button. When keyboard is showing, long press on navbar to move the text cursor.
Tap on an empty navbar space but not the home button to switch the screen off.
Display alert when network is monitored or connected via VPN

Force apps to ignore notch space

Try detecting and adding gaming apps automatically
Display the cross sign next to signal icon when data is disabled
Display popup notifications only for alarm, dialer and messaging app
These are power saving features. They may interfere with services intended to run at idle, like navigation apps. You can whitelist these apps from being affected in the app battery settings.
Enter device idle more frequently and wake up less
Restrict apps from running the background
Enable Aggressive Battery automatically when using battery saver
Display estimated remaining battery life when available
Light up the side edges of the screen on notification pulse
Sets the ambient light animation duration
Display lock icon on the lockscreen
Reset battery statistics after reaching user defined charging level

Smart Charging allows you to set maximum charging level to extend the lifespan of your battery. When enabled, battery stops charging at Stop trigger level and resumes charging at Start trigger level. Stop trigger level should be always greater than Start trigger level.
In order to add your own icon, select the top left icon and use the OnePlus 6T FP Customizer app to select the icon you want.
